    • httpCookieName

      public static ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.Criteria<HttpCookie> httpCookieName​(String name)
      The checking of a cookie.
      Parameters:
      name - is a cookie name
      Returns:
      criteria that checks/filters a cookie
      See Also:
      HttpCookie.getName()

    • httpCookieNameMatches

      public static ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.Criteria<HttpCookie> httpCookieNameMatches​(String expression)
      The checking of a cookie.
      Parameters:
      expression - is a substring of text that a cookie name is supposed to have. It is possible to pass reg exp pattern that name of a cookie should fit.
      Returns:
      criteria that checks/filters a cookie
      See Also:
      HttpCookie.getName()

    • httpCookieIsSecure

      public static ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.Criteria<HttpCookie> httpCookieIsSecure()
      The checking of a cookie. It is used to filter secure cookies. The sample below shows how to make inverted criteria

      NOT(httpCookieIsSecure())

      Returns:
      criteria that checks/filters a cookie
      See Also:
      HttpCookie.getSecure(), Criteria.NOT(Criteria[])

    • httpCookieIsHttpOnly

      public static ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.Criteria<HttpCookie> httpCookieIsHttpOnly()
      The checking of a cookie. It is used to filter http-only cookies. The sample below shows how to make inverted criteria

      NOT(httpCookieIsHttpOnly())

      Returns:
      criteria that checks/filters a cookie
      See Also:
      HttpCookie.isHttpOnly(), Criteria.NOT(Criteria[])

    • httpCookieToDiscard

      public static ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.Criteria<HttpCookie> httpCookieToDiscard()
      The checking of a cookie. It is used to filter cookies to be discarded unconditionally. The sample below shows how to make inverted criteria

      NOT(httpCookieToDiscard())

      Returns:
      criteria that checks/filters a cookie
      See Also:
      HttpCookie.getDiscard(), Criteria.NOT(Criteria[])
